
# Secure Trading 
![securetrading](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/securetrading/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `securetrading` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Secure Trading 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Secure Trading is a full-service payments company – a single point of contact for online payment processing, merchant card acquiring, and PCI compliance and cyber security services. We were founded in 1997 and from the outset focused on delivering extraordinary customer service. As a result, our payments platform has achieved an unrivalled 100% uptime record, and our merchants can trust us to manage every stage in the transaction journey. We offer an exceptionally robust and reliable, fully level 1 PCI DSS compliant online payment gateway, fully licensed merchant card acquiring, and expert consultancy on cyber security and PCI compliance.  Our ecommerce expertise means we can advise on and implement ancillary services – from alternative payment methods and additional layers of fraud protection through to mobile optimised checkouts. Thousands of organisations worldwide trust us to manage their online payments and help their businesses grow. Our unr
